record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 1639

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 1639, introduced earlier today by Senators Kennedy and Specter, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.
